description: Photos from the first day of New York Fashion Week.
title: Off the Runway: Day 1
title_page: Off the Runway: Day 1 - The New York Times
text: Lincoln Center is once again filled with action on the first day of New York Fashion Week. From left, Camila Pontes from Brazil and Manu Foerster and Stefanie Schreiber, both from Germany, engage in typical New York sightseeing: watching fashionistas climb the stairs to the tents.
